job.title: Software Engineer - Backend
job.description: ltpgtwere looking for a backend software engineer to help us build out a nextgeneration freight technology platform as an early engineer at baton youd be given the opportunity to make an impact on a growing team and to own numerous mission critical backend services our team isnt afraid to do what it takes to get the job done whether thats hacking something together to quickly test a prototype hanging out at a warehouse all day to make sure we understand exactly what needs to be built or designing innovative solutions using technology to drive new business opportunities were looking for people who move fast and are driven to make complex and inefficient systems work betterltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhy should you join usltstronggtltpgtltpgtat an early stage startup things move fast and youll have far more responsibility and opportunity for growth than at a larger company you will learn a lot youll iterate through many careersworth of projects and solutions faster than you thought possible however you wont have to go it alone at baton youll have mentorship from accomplished senior engineers and work alongside an impressive team from the top universities and tech companies aroundltpgtltpgtbaton httpswwwbatonio is a wellfunded startup backed by vc maersk sv angel prologis and some of the most successful technology and freight entrepreneurs in the world see coverage here by joe lonsdale httpsrbgysegzm and here by freightwaves httpsrbgyzpeoiltpgtltpgtwere trying to reimagine how goods are moved there is an enormous amount of waste in the backbone of the american economy httpsrbgybnqvg and we have an opportunity to eliminate it whether its finding ways to eliminate detention reduce empty driving miles in trucks on the road is empty improve working conditions for million drivers or accelerate the adoption of electric vehicles we are on the cusp of a paradigm shift that will shape the future of the trucking industryltpgtltpgtyou will have the opportunity to help architect this paradigm shiftltpgtltpgtif this resonates with you wed love to get to know you please applyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtyour roleltstronggt software engineer backend generalistltpgtltulgtltligttake ownership of numerous backend services from ml optimization data pipelines to data model all the way up to the api layer to youll be the goto person when adding new featuresltligtltligtinvent and tinker imagine completely new ideas experiment and build transformative solutions for the freight industryltligtltligtcollaborate with us were a closeknit team with product engineering and operations all working together to build elegant products that improve drivers lives while reducing the massive inefficiencies in truckingltligtltligtgrow with the team we raised our series a and are primed to grow our engineering team to tackle the challenges that come with scaling our business youll get to experience the learnings and the growing pains that come with working at a startup trying to disrupt and transform an industryltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhere you liveltstronggt san francisco bay area or willingness to relocateltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtbasic qualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt years experience in software developmentltligtltligtbackend development experience with python or other modern programming languagesltligtltligtcomprehensive knowledge of modern web architecturesltligtltligtwillingness to learn new technologies and to own the backend for major product featuresltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtnice to haveltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtexperience with tensorflow google ortools or related mloptimization sdksltligtltligtinterest in the freight and logistics spaceltligtltulgt
